item.title: Let's talk about North Texas -- why the Mean Green is the bet to make in December
item.description: Pamela Maldonado breaks down the American conference, and why North Texas is the team to bet on.

item.title: The running man: Josh Allen on cusp of QB history
item.description: The Buffalo Bills' MVP is one rushing TD away from becoming the NFL's all-time leader in rushing TDs by a QB. Will he get it Thursday?

item.title: Facts vs. Feelings: All in on a healthy Brock Purdy, worried about Justin Jefferson
item.description: Why to feel good about starting Brock Purdy and Quinshon Judkins, but be worried about Justin Jefferson.
